CustomField.description: To indicate whether the Flex Time product should be billed within the payroll package or separately through HRIS â€“ For Productivity and Administrative Services payroll packages only. Automatically checked for clients with 0-24 employees. The rep can manually check this box if the client has requested a separate bill from HRIS. Checked box means that billing is from HRIS
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To indicate whether the Flex Time product should be billed within the payroll package or separately through HRIS.
CustomField.label: Flex Time Separate Billing
